string.text: Procure "%s"
Field dress freshly dead mutants to collect game meat. Then deliver %s to Skinflint in the Military Warehouse base camp.
I have just the job for you, man, if you are not afraid of a few mutants. Are you interested?

Some of the guys bring me back a kill or two every now and again. But it's been slow lately - So if you aren't too busy and you are out and about, I need %s. Our cook kills and processes the meat, right here in the kitchen.
Great, you are a good hunter! I have payment for you.
Repel enemy assault
Intercept the assault squad closing in on a Freedom camp. Report back to Lukash once you have cleared the area.
Forces hostile to Freedom are moving in on one of our camps. I need someone capable to repel the incursion. Are you the man for the job?
The task is done? Good.
Recapture territory for Freedom
You have been tasked to recapture a faction territory. Report back to Lukash after the job is done.
I have an important mission if you are willing. Duty has taken over one of our camps and I need an infiltrator to reclaim it.
Excellent. Well done.
Assassinate target
Lukash has tasked you with finding and eliminating an important member of the Monolith.

I have a very dangerous mission. I've asked for volunteers but so far no one has stepped forward. Monolith forces keep breaking through our blockade. I want to take the fight to them for once. I need someone to enter their territory and take out a certain member of their faction to send them a message. What do you think? Are you the biggest daredevil in this camp?
Ah, you survived! Man, you've got a set on you. Great job.
Assassinate target
Lukash has tasked you with finding and eliminating a target.
There is a certain individual who has been very loud in his opposition to Freedom and needs to be quieted. Are you any good at shutting people up?
Great! You do us proud. Here is what I promised:
Find "%s"
Lukash has asked you to find a specific firearm in mint condition. Return to him when you find what he is looking for.
With Duty to the south of us and Monolith to the north, we are cut off. Our weaponry is wearing out and we need replacements. Have you ever done any gun running?
We could really use a new %s. If you can find us one in great condition I would be willing to pay a good price for it.
Well done. This will go a long way in helping us defend the Zone. Here is the payment I promised.
Find "%s"
%s are required by Screw to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Yo, man. Are you interested in doing a job for me? I need specific tools to operate on weapons.
Good, I need a %s. I will pay you if you can bring a set back to me.
Thanks, man! I knew there was a reason I asked you. You look like a man who can get shit done.
Find "%s"
%s are required by Screw to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Haha, I hate to ask. But I could really use more tools. You brought me what I have asked last time but I need a higher quality set. Can you help out again?
I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
You keep this shit up, everyone around here is going to love you. Thanks, man.
Find "%s"
%s are required by Screw to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Haha, I hate to ask. But I could really use more tools. You brought me what I have asked last time but I need a higher quality set. Can you help out again?
I need a set of expert tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
You keep this shit up, everyone around here is going to love you. Thanks, man.
